.. _`igv-reports`:

IGV-REPORTS
===========

Create self-contained igv.js HTML pages.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule igv_report:
        input:
            fasta="minigenome.fa",
            vcf="variants.vcf",
            # any number of additional optional tracks, see igv-reports manual
            tracks=["alignments.bam"]
        output:
            "igv-report.html"
        params:
            extra=""  # optional params, see igv-reports manual
        log:
            "logs/igv-report.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/igv-reports"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
